Hippocampus CA2 bistratified cell broad.DefiningCitation: Mercer et al. J. Neurosci 2007 PMID: 17611285
Hippocampus CA2 bistratified cell broad.Definition: The CA2 bistratified cells have radially oriented dendrites that resemble CA1 bistratified cells, but they extend through stratum oriens and stratum radiatum without entering stratum lacunosum-moleculare. The broad CA2 bistratified cells have dendrites that extend horizontally into all three CA subfields.
